item.title: Melanie add a quote by Lillian Hellman
item.description: "People change... and forget to tell eachother. " -- Lillian Hellman

item.title: Melanie add a quote by Anna Quindlen
item.description: "I would be most content if my children grew up to be the kind of people who think decorating consists mostly of building enough bookshelves." -- Anna Quindlen

item.title: Melanie add a quote by Rainer Maria Rilke
item.description: "Be patient toward all that is unsolved in your heart and try to love the questions themselves, like locked rooms and like books that are now written in a very foreign tongue. Do not now seek the answers, which cannot be given you because you would not be able to live them. And the point is, to live everything. Live the questions now. Perhaps you will then gradually, without noticing it, live along some distant day into the answer." -- Rainer Maria Rilke

item.title: Melanie add a quote by Maya Angelou
item.description: "We need much less than we think we need." -- Maya Angelou

item.title: Melanie add a quote by Ivan Turgenev
item.description: "If we wait for the moment when everything, absolutely everything is ready, we shall never begin." -- Ivan Turgenev

item.title: Melanie add a quote by Joss Whedon
item.description: "Remember to always be yourself. Unless you suck." -- Joss Whedon

item.title: Melanie add a quote by Maya Angelou
item.description: "You alone are enough. You have nothing to prove to anybody." -- Maya Angelou

item.title: Melanie add a quote by A.A. Milne
item.description: "How do you spell 'love'?" - Piglet "You don't spell it...you feel it." - Pooh" -- A.A. Milne
